titles.title: For the relief of Thair Bihnam, Christine Bihnam, Jamie Alan Bihnam, and Natash Bihnam.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 6/28/2001--Introduced. Declares Thair Bihnam, Christine Bihnam, Jamie Alan Bihnam, and Natash Bihnam to be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
